subdisciplines.name: Romanticism
subdisciplines.description: A literary and artistic movement in Europe and America in the late 18th and early 19th centuries, characterized by a heightened interest in nature, emotion, and individualism, and often featuring the supernatural or mystical.

subdisciplines.name: Victorian Studies
subdisciplines.description: The study of literature, culture, and society in the Victorian era, which spanned from 1837 to 1901.
